method.name: POST
method.doc: Creates a new build configuration by copying existing one.

method.name: PUT
method.doc: Put empty collection to remove custom ordering

method.name: GET
method.doc: Empty collection means no custom ordering

method.doc: Empty collection means no custom ordering

method.name: GET
method.doc: Experimental support only. Lists branches from the build configurations of the project

method.name: POST
method.doc: Creates a new build configuration template by copying existing one.

method.name: GET
method.doc: Experimental support only. Use this to get an example of the bean to be posted to the /projects request to create a new project

method.name: GET
method.doc: For compatibility with experimental feature of 8.0

method.name: POST
method.doc: Creates token for the value submitted. The token can then be used in the raw settings files to represent a secure value like password. The kind of the token generated can depend on the project settings

resource.doc: The class contains no logic but is necessary to preserve type information in runtime as otherwise Jersey will not be able to figure out how to unmarshal resource methods parameters With Jersey 1.19 generic types in resource methods cause: java.lang.NullPointerException at com.sun.jersey.core.provider.jaxb.AbstractJAXBProvider.getUnmarshaller(AbstractJAXBProvider.java:140) at com.sun.jersey.core.provider.jaxb.AbstractJAXBProvider.getUnmarshaller(AbstractJAXBProvider.java:123) at com.sun.jersey.core.impl.provider.entity.XMLRootObjectProvider.isReadable(XMLRootObjectProvider.java:121) at com.sun.jersey.core.spi.factory.MessageBodyFactory._getMessageBodyReader(MessageBodyFactory.java:345) at com.sun.jersey.core.spi.factory.MessageBodyFactory._getMessageBodyReader(MessageBodyFactory.java:309) at com.sun.jersey.core.spi.factory.MessageBodyFactory.getMessageBodyReader(MessageBodyFactory.java:298) at com.sun.jersey.spi.container.ContainerRequest.getEntity(ContainerRequest.java:464) at com.sun.jersey.server.impl.model.method.dispatch.EntityParamDispatchProvider$EntityInjectable.getValue(EntityParamDispatchProvider.java:123) at com.sun.jersey.server.impl.inject.InjectableValuesProvider.getInjectableValues(InjectableValuesProvider.java:86) ... 66 more

method.name: POST
method.doc: Adds newline-delimited list of license keys to the server or returns textual description is there are not valid keys

method.name: GET
method.doc: Lists changes by the specified locator

resource.doc: Experimental, the requests and results returned will change in future versions!

method.name: GET
method.doc: Experimental, the requests and results returned will change in future versions!

method.name: DELETE
method.doc: Comment is read from the body as an experimental approach

method.name: GET
method.doc: Lists build types registered on the server. Build templates are not included by default

method.name: GET
method.doc: Serves build configuration or templates according to the locator.

method.name: PUT
method.doc: Replaces the dependencies to those sent in the request.

method.name: POST
method.doc: Creates new snapshot dependency. 'id' attribute is ignored in the submitted descriptor. Reports error if new dependency cannot be created (e.g. another dependency on the specified build configuration already exists).

method.name: PUT
method.doc: Replaces snapshot dependency with those sent in request.

method.name: PUT
method.doc: Replaces trigger with those sent inthe request.

method.name: POST
method.doc: Creates new trigger. 'id' attribute is ignored in the submitted descriptor. Reports error if new trigger cannot be created (e.g. only single trigger of the type is allowed for a build configuration).

method.name: GET
method.doc: Lists branches of the build type.

method.name: PUT
method.doc: Replaces agent requirements with those sent in the request.

method.name: POST
method.doc: Creates new agent requirement. 'id' attribute is ignored in the submitted descriptor. Reports error if new requirement cannot be created (e.g. another requirement is present for the parameter).

method.name: GET
method.doc: Experimental support only. Use this to get an example of the bean to be posted to the /buildTypes request to create a new build type

method.name: GET
method.doc: For compatibility with experimental feature of 8.0

method.doc: Sets VCS labeling settings Experimental support only

method.name: GET
method.doc: Gets VCS labeling settings Experimental support only

resource.doc: Provides some debug abilities for the server. Experimental only. Should be used with caution or better not used if not advised by JetBrains These should never be used for non-debug purposes and the API here can change in future versions of TeamCity without any notice.

method.name: GET
method.doc: experimental use only. Allow to get raw investigations without filtering by no longer present projects, etc.

method.name: GET
method.doc: Serves a build described by the locator provided searching through those accessible by the current user. See {@link jetbrains.buildServer.server.rest.request.BuildRequest#serveAllBuilds(String, String, String, boolean, boolean, boolean, java.util.List, String, String, String, Long, Integer, String, javax.ws.rs.core.UriInfo, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest)} If several builds are matched, the first one is used (the effect is the same as if ",count:1" locator dimension is added)

method.name: PUT
method.doc: Replaces the build's tags designated by the tags 'locator' to the set of tags passed.

method.name: POST
method.doc: Adds a single tag to a build

method.name: POST
method.doc: Adds a set of tags to a build

method.name: POST
method.doc: Experimental. Adds a set of tags to multiple builds

method.name: DELETE
method.doc: Experimental. Deletes a set of tags from multiple builds

method.name: DELETE
method.doc: experimental This forces the properties reload from disk, not deletion

method.name: PUT
method.doc: Experimental. Adds comments to multiple builds

method.name: DELETE
method.doc: Experimental. Removes comment from multiple builds

method.name: PUT
method.doc: Associates the posted set of projects with the pool which replaces earlier associations on this pool

method.name: DELETE
method.doc: Removed all the projects from the pool

method.name: POST
method.doc: Adds the posted project to the pool associated projects

method.name: POST
method.doc: Moves the agent posted to the pool
